name: Ergon
description:
Test yourself as the commander of your own paramilitary unit:

  • build buildings in any number of outposts
  • assign scientists to selected projects
  • manage technological development as you see fit
  • produce equipment for soldiers
  • lead your soldiers on battle field and complete missions

Tactical strategy game inspired by UFO and X-COM games

The currently available version is prepared without an engine (Kotlin and OpenGL ES 2 only) and will not be continued anymore. I wanted to see if I can make a game (or something that resembles it) just with code.

Now I'm starting from the beginning on the Godot engine so I will be able to focus on mechanics and gameplay on Win/Linux/Android. The game is created as an additional project after a full-time job.

If you have any questions, comments or suggestions, feel free to contact me. I will be grateful for your feedback.
